description: Doctor Butterfly is the leader of LXE His original name was Chouno Bakushaku and he is the still-living great-great grandfather of Chouno Koshaku (Papillon). Dr. Butterfly has a moth-shaped mustache, and his battle outfit resembles a white version of Papillon`s, with an attached a cape. He considers Papillon weak, saying he cannot go very far on his own, which leads Papillon to challenge him to a fight with their Buso Renkin. During this, Dr. Butterfly is killed by Papillon just before Victor awakens, and in his last moments, he uses his Buso Renkin to greet Victor.
name: Dr. Butterfly
